Package at.fhj.iit

Class Drink

java.lang.Object
at.fhj.iit.Drink
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cocktail, Coffee, SimpleDrink, Tea
public abstract class Drink
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract base class for concrete drink classes

      public abstract double getAlcoholPercent()
      Calculates and returns the alcohol percentage
      Returns:
      alcohol volume percent (e.g. 50)

    • isAlcoholic

      public abstract boolean isAlcoholic()
      Gives information if drink is alcoholic or not
      Returns:
      true when alcoholic liquids are present, otherwise false
